name: AP_CLAIM_IF_PRED_OUTL_MAP
description: This table extracts data received from Prospective Payment System (PPS) pricer for a claim in POB3.ESRD 'Predicted Outlier Map'.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: PREDICTED_OUTL_MAP
columns.description: Identifies predicted amount of separately payable services for this dialysis line. Data received in POB3.ESRD on incoming message.
